title: Gulf Islands National Seashore: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        Fort Barrancas Access Change  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Fort Barrancas Access Change  The Pensacola Naval Air Station recently changed visitor access rules, which impact visitors trying to visit the Fort Barrancas Area of the national seashore.  Please review our directions page for more information. more
